Name: Elegy for the End
Title: The Parting Refrain: Elegy for the End
Desc: "...But no wind in any season on earth"\n"Shall have you gaze upon me again."

Talent.Name: Elegy for the End
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Burst:</color> Create <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C301102]</color>. (Your character deals +1 DMG, $[K4]: 2)\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3202}Bow Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
